summery: Accomplished Front-End Developer with 3+ years of experience in building scalable Single Page Applications. Expertise in the modern front-end stack, including Angular, React with Next.js. Proven ability to improve performance, enhance SEO, and streamline development processes through best practices for optimizing scalable web applications.

rolesAndResponsibilities: Working in immence integrations over Lead management system, Product Information Management, Online Reputation Management Store locators and much more...

Spearheaded the entire SDLC for high-performance web applications, managing feature delivery from requirement analysis to production deployment via Jenkins for Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD).
Utilized deep knowledge of React and Angular best practices and modern architecture patterns to build scalable and maintainable features within the product suite.
Collaborated across Engineering and Product teams to translate high-level requirements into scalable Front-End solutions, ensuring a unified user experience(UX/UI) across the product suite.
Integrated dozens of RESTful APIs and third-party libraries, leveraging TypeScript and TDD best practices to guarantee code quality and stability for new features.
Executed and monitored build deployments, contributing to a 99.9% uptime for critical application updates and new features, ensuring a smooth and reliable delivery process under Agile Methodology.
Optimized page load speeds by 20% across the main application through code splitting and memoization, directly enhancing core application efficiency and user retention.
Communicated complex technical requirements to non-technical business partners to establish strategic partnerships, resulting in new feature implementations that contributed to revenue increase.
Implemented user-friendly web applications focusing on user interface design using HTML, CSS, TypeScript(a superset of JavaScript), with Angular and React.js libraries.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including backend developers and UX designers, to build successful products.
Interacting with clients, gathered their valuable business input, and converted their ideas into functional user interfaces.

projects.title: Consumer-Apps
projects.subTitle: B2C Web Application: React.js (18+), Next.js (14+), Redux, Zustand, Tailwind CSS
description: Architected and developed a high-performance web application, improving page load speed by 40% through a hybrid rendering strategy (SSG, SSR, CSR), lazy loading, and memoization (validated by Google Lighthouse).
Implemented complex state logic using Redux Toolkit and Zustand for specific module requirements, ensuring predictable and centralized data flow.
Enhanced SEO and search engine crawlability by implementing schema markup and collaborated with industry leaders to deliver custom solutions.

projects.title: MyMedic/Super-app
projects.subTitle: Enterprise SaaS B2B Platform: Angular (8, 16+), TypeScript, Bootstrap
description: Built a scalable B2B SaaS platform that streamlined slot booking and order management for diagnostic, pharmacy, and doctor modules, enhancing operational efficiency and reducing product creation time for new subscribers.
Architected the platform using a micro-frontend approach (if applicable in Angular, mention this) and leveraged the Angular CLI for efficient project management and build optimization.
Led customization for high-profile clients and integrated Firebase Cloud Messaging to enable real-time notifications, significantly improving user engagement.
